plot: The bear has stolen a beehive and is trying to escape the country. Meanwhile the angry beekeepers are in hot pursuit and the bear must think fast in order to make his getaway.
title: The Honey Plot
plot_es: The bear has stolen a beehive and is trying to escape the country. Meanwhile the angry beekeepers are in hot pursuit and the bear must think fast in order to make his getaway.
plot_en: The bear has stolen a beehive and is trying to escape the country. Meanwhile the angry beekeepers are in hot pursuit and the bear must think fast in order to make his getaway.
